scripts.postpull: git checkout development 2>/dev/null || git checkout -b development
scripts.commit: sh -c 'if [[ -n $(git status --porcelain) ]]; then git add . && echo ${0} ${*} | git commit -aF - && git push; fi'
scripts.precommit: bun run --silent repo &&  bun run --silent postpull && bun run ci/env.ts
scripts.deploy: sh -c 'git stash && git merge main -m Deploy; git commit -a -m "v$npm_package_version"; git push'
